mean_cn: v. 放逐，排斥，（古希腊）按贝壳流放法放逐
mean_en: to not allow (someone) to be included in a group :to exclude (someone) from a group
word_etyma: ostrac瓦片+ize使...→ [典故]古希腊人用瓦片或贝壳投票，选出自己认为危害国家安全的人，进而放逐危险政治家 → 流放；放逐
sentence: The brown eggs ostracize the white egg because he's different.
